text: was a 9-dan professional Go player. He reached to 800 career wins, and he was the oldest professional player in Japan from 2004 to 2017. ==Family== His wife is Kazuko Sugiuchi, a professional player who won several female titles. His sisters in law (Sachiko Honda and Teruko Kusunoki) are also professional players. ==References== ==Notable results== Title Notes Honinbo (本因坊) Challenged to the defending champion in 1954 and 1958 Tengen (天元, Center) Challenged to the defending champion in 1976 NHK Cup Finalist in 1982 ==Other websites== *Masao Sugiuchi's page at Nihon Ki-in website Category:1920 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Japanese Go players
title: Masao Sugiuchi
